typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrderDetails
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		ShipDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		TotalCost as decimal(10,0),
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrder
CloudSalesOrder, CloudSalesOrderDetails join(CloudSalesOrder@OrderID == CloudSalesOrderDetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinOrderAndOrderDetails
JoinOrderAndOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = CloudSalesOrder@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		OrderCreatedDate = CloudSalesOrder@CreatedDate,
		OrderUpdatedDate = CloudSalesOrder@UpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		DetailsCreatedDate = CloudSalesOrderDetails@CreatedDate,
		DetailsUpdatedDate = CloudSalesOrderDetails@UpdatedDate
	)) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(SourceSystemID = 'SouthridgeSalesOrders') ~> CreateRecordIDs
CreateRecordIDs sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesOrders.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SouthridgeSalesOrders
